v8:item.v8:content: External data processor the template belongs to.
Document or list the template is associated with.
Convert Cyrillic letters into Latin letters.
Insert signature and stamp into the print form.
Full name of the metadata object that provides data for this template's placeholders.
Has placeholders associated to a document
Flag that indicates whether the template has placeholders that obtain values from a document.
Template of mail message body in HTML format.
Message format: HTML or Plain text.
Indicates who can see the template: If cleared, all users can use the template. If selected, only the author can use the template.
File and print form names will contain only Latin letters and digits to ensure compatibility with different operating systems.
Attach print forms as an archive.
Format the print forms are saved in.
Indicates whether the template is generated by an external data processor.
When you compose a message, the placeholders are replaced with values.
Defines how the placeholder is presented when you insert it in a message.
